comment.author: 80071992@N06
comment._content: Is great grandfather Longanecker referring to Samuel Longanecker who was married to Mariah Gsell?

comment.author: 52529054@N06
comment._content: According to the information I found within this collection, the great grandfather Longanecker referred to is a Jacob Longanecker who was married to Lydia (Showalter) Longanecker. I hope that is helpful!

comment.author: 80071992@N06
comment._content: Thank you so much!  Jacob who was married to Lydia Showalter is a part of my direct line--I am so happy to see these pictures!

comment.author: 80071992@N06
comment._content: Next question--would it be possible for me to get copies of all 14 pictures of this set?  Thanks.
